dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 375 IH: Puerto Rico Air Cargo Industry Empowerment Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. González-Colón introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, with respect to air cargo in Puerto Rico, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Puerto Rico Air Cargo Industry Empowerment Act.

section.header: Cargo in Alaska or Puerto Rico
section.text: Section 41703(e) of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in the subsection heading by inserting or Puerto Rico after Alaska; and
by inserting or Puerto Rico after Alaska each place it appears.
